content: description this cozy cowl sweater is worked from the top down don t let that intimidate you it s very simple and fun to do the pattern is seamless and works the same stitch throughout if you aren t a fan of cowl necks it is easy to remove and keep a simple neckline pattern is free on my blog- click here 1 1 https //www eandpcrochet com/the-willow-sweater/
